directive_1.description: Outcome-First Generation Daemon - prioritizes outcome evaluation over hypothesis generation during freeze
directive_1.implementation: Created dir_016_outcome_evaluator.py daemon that uses hypothesis_ledger entries and creates outcome evaluation records in expectation_outcome_ledger
directive_1.note: Daemon correctly detects freeze status and creates evaluations. Fixed schema issues (uses hypothesis_ledger.hypothesis_id not hypothesis_canon.canon_id).
directive_1.test_results: 16 outcome evaluations created successfully during test

baseline_metrics.evaluation_logic: Uses hypothesis_ledger entries (not hypothesis_canon) to satisfy foreign key constraint. Links 8 hypotheses to 2 calendar events (US_PPI, US_CLAIMS).

technical_notes.schema_fix: hypothesis_ledger.hypothesis_id (UUID) is required by expectation_outcome_ledger foreign key constraint. hypothesis_canon.canon_id does not link to ledger.
